alert.note: Alert for Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:38PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Rooks County through 530 PM CDT... At 438 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Zurich, or 20 miles north of Ellis, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Plainville around 445 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Stockton and Woodston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
